column2: GE to sell $1.4 bln U.S. hotel franchise loan portfolio March 29 General Electric Co said it had agreed to sell GE Capital's U.S. hotel franchise loan portfolio to a unit of Western Alliance Bancorp.

column2: Wells Fargo to pay California. $8.5 mln for privacy law violationsUPDATE 2-Wells Fargo to pay $8.5 mln for California privacy violationsWells Fargo to pay $8.5 mln for California privacy violations A Wells Fargo & Co unit will pay $8.5 million to California and five of the state's counties to settle charges that it violated customers' privacy by recording their calls without first notifying them
